references.reason: This paper introduces the variational autoencoder (VAE), a fundamental model for the paper's approach.

references.paper_title: High-resolution image synthesis with latent diffusion models
references.reason: This paper is highly influential for its work on high-resolution image synthesis using diffusion models, which the current paper extends to video.

references.paper_title: OD-VAE: An omni-dimensional video compressor for improving latent video diffusion model
references.reason: This paper introduces a key competitor model that the current paper aims to improve upon.

references.paper_title: Video generation models as world simulators
references.reason: This paper is highly relevant to the field of video generation and is a significant advancement that the current work builds upon.

references.paper_title: Allegro: Open the black box of commercial-level video generation model
